name: com.unity.adaptiveperformance.samsung.android
description:
The Adaptive Performance Samsung (Android) provider is a subsystem for Adaptive Performance to extend Adaptive Performance to Samsung Android devices. It transmits device-specific information to the Adaptive Performance system and enables you to receive data about the thermal state of a Samsung Android device. 

By installing this package, you agree to the terms and conditions of the Samsung GameSDK End User License Agreement found under "View licenses" above.
